tool.name: Create Target-Decoy Database
tool.description: Creates a target-decoy database for use with Peptide Shaker
tool.help:
**What it does**
Given an input database, this tool will produce a target-decoy database in the format required by PeptideShaker using dbtoolkit.
------
**Citation**
For the underlying tool, please cite `Martens et al. DBToolkit: processing protein databases for peptide-centric proteomics. Bioinformatics (2005) vol. 21 (17) pp. 3584-5`.
If you use this tool in Galaxy, please cite Chilton J, et al. https://bitbucket.org/galaxyp/peptideshaker .
